ygData.subject: Re: Riposte Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Reposte is a counter attack you get upon a successful parry, based upon skill.  I ve got it, but I m not sure if the reposte attack is my damage, or if it
ygData.messageBody:
Reposte is a counter attack you get upon a successful parry, based upon
skill. I've got it, but I'm not sure if the reposte attack is my damage, or
if it actually turns the mobs damage against him....ie, Zealot hits me for
74, I reposte, do I do 74 points of damage, or the damage that my weapon can
do?

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Riposte Skill
>
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Riposte traditionally is to counterattack after a parry (fencing term). I
> GUESS thats what it would be in the game as well...
>
> Jaade,
> Indigo Sista Soldier.
